```
def PocketMoney():
    money = good_behavior * rate
    tax = (good_behavior  / 100) * 20
    print (money)
    print (tax)
good_behavior = int(input("Please enter the number of days you were
good "))
rate = float(input("Please enter your pocket money rate " ))
```

```
